tika-vin08t19:1_0: 101. Evaṁ catukālikavinicchayaṁ kathetvā idāni kappiyakuṭivinicchayaṁ kathetuṁ ‘‘kappiyā
tika-vin08t19:1_1: catubhūmiyo’’tiādimāha. Tattha kappantīti kappiyā, kappa sāmatthiyeti dhātu. Bhavanti
tika-vin08t19:1_2: etāsu antovutthaantopakkānīti bhūmiyo, catasso bhūmiyo catubhūmiyo, catasso kappiyakuṭiyoti
tika-vin08t19:1_3: attho. Katamā tāti āha ‘‘ussāvanantikā…pe… veditabbā’’ti. Kathaṁ viññāyaticcāha ‘‘anujānāmi…pe…
tika-vin08t19:1_4: vacanato’’ti. Idaṁ bhesajjakkhandhakapāḷiṁ (mahāva. 295) sandhāyāha. Tattha uddhaṁ
tika-vin08t19:1_5: sāvanā ussāvanā, ussāvanā anto yassā kappiyabhūmiyāti ussāvanantikā. Gāvo nisīdanti
tika-vin08t19:1_6: etthāti gonisādikā, go-saddūpapada ni-pubbasada visaraṇagatyāvasānesūti dhātu. Gahapatīhi
tika-vin08t19:1_7: dinnāti gahapati, uttarapadalopatatiyātappurisoyaṁ. Kammavācāya sammannitabbāti sammutīti
tika-vin08t19:1_8: evamimāsaṁ viggaho kātabbo. Tatthāti kappiyakuṭivinicchaye. Taṁ pana avatvāpīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
tika-vin08t19:1_9: vuttanayaṁ avatvāpi. Pi-saddena tathāvacanampi anujānāti. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena
tika-vin08t19:1_11: vā vutte. Sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti sabbaaṭṭhakathānaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ ussāvanantikakuṭikaraṇalakkhaṇaṁ.
tika-vin08t19:1_12: Cayanti adhiṭṭhānaṁ uccavatthuṁ. Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakato silato mattikāpiṇḍato
tika-vin08t19:1_13: vā paṭṭhāya. Paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṁ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭantīti paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṁ heṭṭhābhūmiyaṁ
tika-vin08t19:1_14: patiṭṭhāpiyamānā iṭṭhakādayo bhūmigatikattā ‘‘kappiyakuṭiṁ karomā’’ti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṁ
tika-vin08t19:1_15: na vaṭṭanti. Yadi evaṁ bhūmiyaṁ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapiyamānā thambhā kasmā tathā vatvā
tika-vin08t19:2: Saṅghasantakamevāti vāsatthāya kataṁ saṅghikasenāsanaṁ sandhāya vadati. Bhikkhusantakanti vāsatthāya eva kataṁ bhikkhussa puggalikasenāsanaṁ.
tika-vin08t19:4_0: Vimativinodaniyaṁ (vi. vi. ṭī. mahāvagga 2.295) pana evaṁ vuttaṁ – taṁ pana avatvāpīti
tika-vin08t19:4_1: pi-saddena tathāvacanampi anujānāti. Aṭṭhakathāsūti andhakaṭṭhakathāvirahitāsu sesaṭṭhakathāsu.
tika-vin08t19:4_2: Sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti andhakaṭṭhakathāya saha sabbaṭṭhakathānaṁ samānaṁ. Cayanti adhiṭṭhānaṁ
tika-vin08t19:4_3: uccavatthuṁ. Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakādito paṭṭhāya cayaṁ ādiṁ katvā bhittiṁ uṭṭhāpetukāmāti
tika-vin08t19:4_4: attho. ‘‘Thambhā pana upari uggacchanti, tasmā vaṭṭantī’’ti etena iṭṭhakapāsāṇā heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t19:4_5: patiṭṭhāpiyamānāpi yadi cayato, bhūmito vā ekaṅgulamattampi uggatā tiṭṭhanti, vaṭṭantīti siddhaṁ hoti.
tika-vin08t19:5_0: Ārāmoti upacārasīmāparicchinno sakalo vihāro. Senāsanānīti vihārassa anto tiṇakuṭiādikāni
tika-vin08t19:5_1: saṅghassa nivāsagehāni. Vihāragonisādikā nāmāti senāsanagonisādikā nāma. Senāsanāni
tika-vin08t19:5_3: iminā tato ūnaparikkhitto yebhuyyena aparikkhitto nāma, tasmā aparikkhittasaṅkhameva
tika-vin08t19:5_4: gacchatīti dasseti. Etthāti upaḍḍhādiparikkhitte. Kappiyakuṭi laddhuṁ vaṭṭatīti gonisādikāya
tika-vin08t19:5_5: abhāvena sesakappiyakuṭīsu tīsu yā kāci kappiyakuṭi kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t19:6_0: Tesaṁ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṁ vāsatthāya katampi yāva na denti, tāva tesaṁ santakaṁyeva
tika-vin08t19:6_1: bhavissatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Vihāraṁṭhapetvāti upasampannānaṁ vāsatthāya kataṁ gehaṁ
tika-vin08t19:6_2: ṭhapetvāti attho. Gehanti nivāsagehaṁ. Tadaññaṁ pana uposathāgārādi sabbaṁ anivāsagehaṁ
tika-vin08t19:6_3: catukappiyabhūmivimuttā pañcamī kappiyabhūmi. Saṅghasantakepi hi etādise gehe suṭṭhu
tika-vin08t19:6_4: parikkhittārāmaṭṭhepi abbhokāse viya antovutthādidoso natthi. Yena kenaci channe
tika-vin08t19:6_5: paricchanne ca sahaseyyappahonake bhikkhussa, saṅghassa vā nivāsagehe antovutthādidoso,
tika-vin08t19:6_6: na aññattha. Tenāha ‘‘yaṁ panā’’tiādi. Tattha ‘‘saṅghikaṁ vā puggalikaṁ vā’’ti idaṁ
tika-vin08t19:6_7: kiñcāpi bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṁ sāmaññato vuttaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pana saṅghikaṁ puggalikañca
tika-vin08t19:6_8: bhikkhunīnaṁ, tāsaṁ saṅghikaṁ puggalikañca bhikkhūnaṁ gihisantakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin08t19:7: Mukhasannidhīti antosannihitadoso hi mukhappavesananimittaṁ āpattiṁ karoti, nāññathā, tasmā ‘‘mukhasannidhī’’ti (vi. vi. ṭī. mahāvagga 2.295) vuttoti.
tika-vin08t19:8_0: Tattha tattha khaṇḍā hontīti upaḍḍhato adhikaṁ khaṇḍā honti. Sabbasmiṁ chadane vinaṭṭheti
tika-vin08t19:8_1: tiṇapaṇṇādivassaparittāyake chadane vinaṭṭhe. Gopānasīnaṁ pana upari vallīhi baddhadaṇḍesu
tika-vin08t19:8_2: ṭhitesupi jahitavatthukā honti eva. Pakkhapāsakamaṇḍalanti ekasmiṁ passe tiṇṇaṁ gopānasīnaṁ
tika-vin08t19:9_1: dinne kappiyaṁ hoti, sāpekkhadānañcettha vaṭṭati, paṭiggahaṇaṁ viya na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t19:9_2: Antopakkasāmaṁpakkesu pana ‘‘na, bhikkhave, antovutthaṁ antopakkaṁ sāmaṁpakkaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ,
tika-vin08t19:9_3: yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ antopakkaṁ sāmaṁpakkaṁ,
tika-vin08t19:9_4: tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṁ dukkaṭānaṁ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ antopakkaṁ
tika-vin08t19:9_5: aññehi pakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṁ dukkaṭānaṁ. Anto ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin08t19:9_6: vutthaṁ bahipakkaṁ sāmaṁpakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṁ dukkaṭānaṁ. Bahi
tika-vin08t19:9_7: ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ antopakkaṁ sāmaṁpakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṁ
tika-vin08t19:9_8: dukkaṭānaṁ. Anto ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ bahipakkaṁ aññehi pakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t19:9_9: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ antopakkaṁ aññehi pakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t19:9_10: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ bahipakkaṁ sāmaṁpakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t19:9_11: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bahi ce, bhikkhave, vutthaṁ bahipakkaṁ aññehi pakkaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin08t19:9_12: anāpattī’’ti (mahāva. 274) vacanato ekaṁ tirāpattikaṁ, tīṇi durāpattikāni, tīṇi ekāpattikāni,
tika-vin08t19:9_13: ekaṁ anāpattikanti aṭṭha honti. Tattha antovutthanti akappiyakuṭiyaṁ vutthaṁ. Antopakkepi
tika-vin08t19:9_14: eseva nayo. Sāmaṁpakkanti yaṁ kiñci āmisaṁ bhikkhussa pacituṁ na vaṭṭati. Tattha
